content: {A开心}Bhan, Bhanbhan! Bhan~bhan...Bhan~? Wow, it's [article_or_num:1,{奖励石}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{奖励石}]</style>! Congratulations, well, it is me after all—wait, no, it's down to you!
info: NPC特色交互-巴彦-赌石_巴彦

content: The right one? You sure? Are you super duper double sure? Okay, no changing your mind now. Lemme take a look...
info: NPC特色交互-巴彦-赌石_巴彦

content: You want me to choose for you? I knew you'd say that! So... I'll pick the right one!
info: NPC特色交互-巴彦-赌石_巴彦

content: {A挑衅坏笑}Take a guess! I just happen to have two stones. In my left paw I've got misty clouds, and in my right there's rays of dawn. Come on and pick one bhan?

content: Bhan, bhanbhan! Bhan~ Bhan... {A歪头}Bhan~? It's [article_or_num:1,{奖励石}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{奖励石}]</style>! Not bad. It's quite lively.{短暂停} I mean the stone.
